named-query.name: JpaSelectEmployeeFetchDepartmentTest
named-query.query: select e from Employee e left outer join fetch e.department

named-query.name: JpaSelectEmployeeFetchAddressTest
named-query.query: select e from Employee e left outer join fetch e.address

named-query.name: JpaSelectDepartmentFetchEmployeeTest
named-query.query: select distinct d from Department d left outer join fetch d.employees

named-query.name: JpaSelectEmployeePagingTest
named-query.query: select e from Employee e order by e.employeeId
